form.mandatory-fields: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory

api-error-messages.login-unauthorized-error: Wrong email address, username and/or password.
api-error-messages.bad-request-error: The information input is not in the correct format.
api-error-messages.internal-server-error: The service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.

subtitle.text: Don't have a Pix account yet?

cgu.error: Please accept terms of service before you sign up
cgu.label: ''*'' I accept ''Pix's CGU''

password.error: Password should have 8 characters, one uppercase and lowercase letter and one number at least.
password.help: (8 char min, with uppercase, lowercase and a number)
password.label: Password

signup-form.instructions: Fields marked with '<abbr title="mandatory" class="mandatory-mark">'*'</abbr>' are mandatory
signup-form.legal-information: By signing in, you allow Pix to store your data. They will be kept for a maximum of 5 years, starting with your last sign in date, and will then be archived according to statutory limitation periods (5 years). They are only used by Pix and Pix's service providers. In accordance to the law « informatique et libertés », you can exercise your right of access to data and correct them by sending an email to dpd@pix.fr.
signup-form.title: Sign up

details.levelInfo: { remainingPixToNextLevel } pix left before level { level }

improve.label: You will be able to start over in
improve.count: { daysBeforeImproving, plural, =0 {0 jour.} =1 {1 jour.} other {# jours.} }

reset.label: { daysBeforeReset, plural, =0 {0 day} =1 {1 day} other {# days} } left before reset.

modal.title: Remise à zéro de la compétence
modal.importantMessage: Vos { earnedPix } Pix vont être supprimés.
modal.importantMessageAboveLevelOne: Votre niveau { level } et vos { earnedPix } Pix vont être supprimés.
modal.warning: Attention : si vous avez un parcours d’évaluation en cours, certaines questions pourront vous être reposées.

tutorials.title: Cultivez vos compétences
tutorials.description: Voici une sélection de tutos qui pourront vous aider à gagner des Pix.
